divs: Sighting DetailsWe weres traveling to a friend's house and we saw in the sky a very rare star while it was ranning. There were not other stars in the sky and suddenly it dessapeared doing a fast movement to the side after being static for few minutes. It was far away but it was not an start because the light was very strong, it looked like it was under the clouds and it vanished doing a very fast move to the side so it could not be a metheorite. It was like a star but with a light 10 times stronger than any other. We were driving all the time straight to the UFO so we looked exactly when it desappeared
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in San Juan
There were no other sightings in San Juan on or around December 26th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Rare star like UFO appeared but it vanished suddenly doing fast side move.
